attributes.action: Increase the help available to victims of sexual assault and rape, and to bring justice to those who committed the acts.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every day, someone out there is raped, sexually assaulted and sexually abused. The disgusting members of our society who commit these crimes are walking the streets free. They have not been brought to justice. If they do go to court (1 in 10 cases do not) they only get a wrap across the knuckles. This is dispicable. How do you know who to trust? And especially when you know that the law doesn't work in a victims favour. We want justice! Tougher sentences on these perverted people who destroy their victim, take away their innocence and their soul. Its something no victim will ever forget and it impacts their life forever!
